subject.description: Entity ids to be examined, e.g. NCBIGene:9342, NCBIGene:7227, NCBIGene:8131, NCBIGene:157570, NCBIGene:51164, NCBIGene:6689, NCBIGene:6387

background.description: Entity ids in background set, e.g. NCBIGene:84570, NCBIGene:3630; used in over-representation tests

subject_category.description: Default: gene. Other types may be used e.g. disease but statistics may not make sense

max_p_value.description: Exclude results with p-value greater than this

ontology.description: ontology id. Must be obo id. Examples: go, mp, hp, uberon (optional: will be inferred if left blank)

taxon.description: must be NCBITaxon CURIE. Example: NCBITaxon:9606
